description: This file is a FastAPI router module for performing CRUD operations on notes, including endpoints for listing, retrieving, creating, updating, and deleting notes. It defines route handlers, dependency injection, and references internal schema, repository, and service modules related to Note management.

methods.name: NoteService get_service()
methods.description: Provides a singleton instance of NoteService, initializing it with an in-memory repository if not already created.

methods.name: List[Note] list_notes( q: str | None = Query(default=None, description="Optional title substring filter"), service: NoteService = Depends(get_service), )
methods.description: Handles HTTP GET requests to list all notes, with optional filtering by title substring.

methods.name: Note get_note(note_id: UUID, service: NoteService = Depends(get_service))
methods.description: Handles HTTP GET request to retrieve a specific note by UUID.

methods.name: Note create_note(payload: NoteCreate, service: NoteService = Depends(get_service))
methods.description: Handles HTTP POST request to create a new note with provided title and content.

methods.name: Note update_note(note_id: UUID, payload: NoteUpdate, service: NoteService = Depends(get_service))
methods.description: Handles HTTP PATCH request to update specified fields of an existing note.

methods.name: None delete_note(note_id: UUID, service: NoteService = Depends(get_service))
methods.description: Handles HTTP DELETE request to remove a note by UUID.

ctags.name: create_note
ctags.pattern: /^def create_note(payload: NoteCreate, service: NoteService = Depends(get_service)) -> Note:$/

ctags.name: delete_note
ctags.pattern: /^def delete_note(note_id: UUID, service: NoteService = Depends(get_service)) -> None:$/

ctags.name: get_note
ctags.pattern: /^def get_note(note_id: UUID, service: NoteService = Depends(get_service)) -> Note:$/

ctags.name: list_notes
ctags.signature: ( q: str | None = Query(default=None, description="Optional title substring filter"), service: NoteService = Depends(get_service), )

ctags.name: update_note
ctags.pattern: /^def update_note(note_id: UUID, payload: NoteUpdate, service: NoteService = Depends(get_service))/
ctags.signature: (note_id: UUID, payload: NoteUpdate, service: NoteService = Depends(get_service))
